feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.46
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for Zugferd Tax Business Categorization
  • v5.11.46 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10723

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.45...v5.11.46

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.49
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Zugferd fixes
  • Prevent Client and Contact names from duplicating on PDFs
  • New React UI
  • v5.11.49 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10727

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.48...v5.11.49
